explains: n. 谴责，严厉指责；非难的理由

sentences.en: There was widespread condemnation of the invasion.
sentences.cn: 那次侵略遭到了人们普遍的谴责。

sentences.en: There was widespread condemnation of Saturday's killings.
sentences.cn: 人们对星期六的几起杀人事件给予谴责。

sentences.en: Editors were unanimous in their condemnation of the proposals.
sentences.cn: 编辑们一致谴责这些提议。
